Hi every one we have a problem with Calibrating our limelight

We took the pictures and we want to calibrate, but it takes too long more than two hours.
And it still didnâ€™t show any results. We tried refreshing the page and trying again, but it didnâ€™t work. What should we do? (btw we are using the limelight 4)

image670Ã—670 41.3 KB

How many pictures did you take? How many of them were valid? How many corners were valid? Two hours is very long and I would guess something went wrong.

I would verify thatr you see messages that validate that the calibration started, pictures were valid and corners were detected.

Usually calibration should take no more than 30 seconds. (Generally) donâ€™t take more than 60-75 images and try to make sure a good portion of them are valid. Try and use the exposure and other settings youâ€™d use whilst at comp.

As to why it takes so long to calibrate? My guess would be the limelight is running out of memory and has to reach into the SSD storage which slows down transfer speeds significantly. Iâ€™m not sure either but it is what it is.

well I found out what was the problem

I thought you needed to measure the width and the Hight in mm so we did 923 on 721

instead of 11 on 8
now I got why it couldnâ€™t calculate it

Thank you guys for the help
